## Credentials.fromEnv() method

Load client credentials from the `CERBOS_HUB_CLIENT_ID` and `CERBOS_HUB_CLIENT_SECRET` environment variables.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static fromEnv(env?: Record<string, string | undefined>, options?: ClientOptions): Credentials;
```

**Returns:**

[Credentials](./hub.credentials.md)

## Exceptions

[MissingCredentials](./hub.missingcredentials.md) if the environment variables are not set or are set to empty strings.
